PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13872022-12-16,  ,  PS,  , 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of FRANÇOIS LEVERT of Shediac, New Brunswick, as a full-time member of the Atlantic Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years; and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Atlantic Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, effective March 26, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of FRANÇOIS LEVERT of Shediac, New Brunswick, as a full-time member of the Atlantic Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years; and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Atlantic Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, effective March 26, 2023.
